versions.name: Pre-Alpha 2.0
additions: Basic network system (currently only available in the terminal)
Cryptocurrency miner app that generates in-game money
Task-manager app that displays system utilization
Wallet app that displays balance and transactions
Settings app to set the wallpaper and terminal text color
Base for hardware exchange among players
Ability to change the account password (not available in the frontend yet)
Ability to stop and delete services (except SSH and not available in the frontend yet)
enhancements: Login and registration, added a password strength indicator
changes: Password requirements: no special characters, but instead one upper and lower case character
fixes: Several bugs in the start menu and the terminal
Miner app could be opened multiple times
Many bugs in the frontend and backend

versions.name: Pre-Alpha 1.0
additions: Desktop with taskbar and start menu
Access to remote systems by entering specific commands
Basic filesystem: create, open, rename and delete files (e.g. wallet is a file)
